title: House Robber
description:
You are a professional robber planning to rob houses along a street. Each house has a certain amount of money stashed. The only constraint is that **adjacent houses have security systems connected**, so robbing two adjacent houses will trigger an alarm.

Given an integer array `nums` representing the amount of money in each house, return the **maximum amount of money** you can rob tonight **without alerting the police** (i.e., without robbing two adjacent houses).
